description:
It only takes seconds for an accident or mistake by another person to change your life forever. If you feel as though you have lost control over your life after suffering serious injuries through no fault of your own, look no further than the team at Hensley Cloninger & Greer, P.C. They understand your need to get your life back on track, and they will stick with you from start to finish. From the law firm's office here in Ashville, North Carolina, the experienced team provides superior and competent legal representation to numerous people who face similar circumstances.

The law firm's founders, John Hensley and John Cloninger, apply the same assertive and compassionate assistance to all their clients to help increase the odds of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation available for each client's unique circumstances. They have long history of successfully fighting for clients facing numerous personal injury matters, including the following:

• Medical malpractice, including nursing home abuse
• Birth injuries and cerebral palsy
• Traumatic brain injuries
• Auto and truck accidents
• Premises liability claims, such as assault, slip-and-fall accidents, and dog bites
• Defective product claims
• Workers' compensation and/or third-party claims, such as on-the-job injuries and occupational illnesses
• Wrongful death in the event of the loss of a loved one

Mr. Hensley and Mr. Cloninger understand that this is a challenging time in your life, and you need to know that you are not just another case file for us. When you need guidance and assistance with a personal injury matter, Hensley Cloninger & Greer, P.C., is here to help. The law firm offers a free initial consultation, so you can find out just what they can do for you.
